# נכסים בישראל - Real Estate Management System

## Project Overview
This is a React + Vite application for managing real estate properties in Israel with full Hebrew and RTL support.

## Key Features
- Property management (CRUD operations)
- Loan calculator with Hebrew support
- User authentication (mock implementation)
- RTL design with Israeli color scheme
- Responsive design for all screen sizes

## Technical Stack
- **Frontend**: React 19 + Vite
- **State Management**: Redux Toolkit
- **Routing**: React Router DOM
- **Styling**: CSS Modules with RTL support

## Development Guidelines
- All text and UI elements support Hebrew (RTL)
- Use CSS Modules for component styling
- Follow Redux Toolkit patterns for state management
- Maintain responsive design principles
- Include comments in Hebrew for better context

## Project Structure
```
src/
├── components/     # UI components
├── pages/          # Application pages
├── store/          # Redux store and slices
├── App.jsx         # Main app component
└── main.jsx        # Entry point
```

## Available Scripts
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run lint` - Run ESLint

## Current Status
✅ All MVP features implemented and working
✅ Project compiles without errors
✅ Development server running successfully
